name: Floral Cotton-Blend Short-Sleeve Blouse
desc: A study of femininity, this slim-fitting blouse is distinguished by layered sleeves, delicate shirring and slender self-ties on the neck. It's made with a lightweight cotton blend printed with the season's floral motif.

name: Shea Charmeuse Wrap Blouse
desc: Crafted in Italy from stretch-infused silk charmeuse for a beautiful hand and a luxurious drape, the Shea blouse is designed with an array of romantic elements, including a convenient wrap closure, slightly relaxed long sleeves with genuine mother-of-pearl buttons and a shawl-style neckline.

name: Denim Roll-Tab-Sleeve Shirt
desc: Cut for a comfortable, relaxed silhouette, this updated take on the essential shirt is designed with dark-wash denim and roll-tab sleeves. It's detailed with antiqued, brass-finished fish-eye buttons for a refined finishing touch.

name: Ruffle-Trim Gauze Flutter-Sleeve Shirt
desc: Crafted with ultra-lightweight cotton-blend gauze for an airy look and feel, this piece updates a classic shirting silhouette with effervescent ruffles and whimsical flutter sleeves. LRL-engraved buttons lend a signature finishing touch.

name: Classic Fit Two-Tone Georgette Shirt
desc: Embellished with signature engraved buttons, this stylish two-tone shirt is crafted with a luxurious combination of fluid georgette and lustrous satin.

name: Easy Care Stretch Cotton Shirt
desc: Made from a fabric that is specially treated to resist wrinkles, this shirt will retain its crisp look from the dryer all the way to your dinner reservation.
